title: Postponement of the consideration of the modalities of the 2028 United Nations Water Conference to the eighty-first session of the
text:
United Nations

General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
23 December 2025 
Original: English

Eightieth session 
Agenda item 18 
Sustainable development 
 
 
 
 
 
Tajikistan:* draft decision** 
 
 
 
 Postponement of the consideration of the modalities of the 2028 
United Nations Water Conference to the eighty-first session of the 
General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Recalling its resolutions 71/222 of 21 December 2016, in which it proclaimed 
the period from 2018 to 2028 the International Decade for Action, “Water for 
Sustainable Development”, and 77/334 of 1 September 2023, by which it decided to 
convene, in 2028, the United Nations Conference on the Final Comprehensive Review 
of the Implementation of the Objectives of the International Decade for Action, and 
further decided to consider, before the end of its eightieth session, the modalities of 
the Conference, 
 
Recognizing the convening of the 2026 United Nations Water Conference to 
Accelerate the Implementation of Sustainable Development Goal 6: Ensure 
availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all in the United 
Arab Emirates, and emphasizing the importance of building on the achievements of 
the Conference and ensuring that the modalities for the 2028 Conference are 
informed, coherent, efficient and aligned with the overall follow-up to the 
International Decade for Action, “Water for Sustainable Development”, 2018–2028, 
and the achievements of the 2026 Conference, 
 
Decides: 
 
(a) 
To postpone to its eighty-first session the consideration of the modalities 
of the 2028 United Nations Water Conference; 
 
(b) 
That the consideration of the modalities of the 2028 United Nations Water 
Conference shall be undertaken in the most efficient and effective manner, recalling the 
generous offer of the Government of Tajikistan to host the Conference in Dushanbe. 
 
 
 
* Any changes to the list of sponsors will be reflected in the official record of the meeting. 
 
** In order for the General Assembly to take action on the present proposal, it will be necessary to 
decide to consider agenda item 18 directly in plenary meeting.
